'''''Aparecium''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to either indwell an [[Iktomisaur]] or use a [[Masters of the Night-Wind]] character to create a Nightspirit Body using [[Nightspirit Graffiti]] for the first time.

==Trivia==
* This achievement may be a reference to the Harry Potter spell of the [[w:c:harrypotter:Revealing Charm|same name]], which is used to reveal hidden writing.
